title: Wentworth Prison: Get an inside look at season 3's explosive finale - TV
text: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4526524591001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14526524591001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4526524591001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4526524591001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14526524591001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4526524591001.init(); ai_type="video"; } Go behind the scenes of Wentworth Prison in a new clip exclusive to Digital Spy.The excerpt is taken from the special features on the Wentworth Prison: Season Three DVD box-set, available from next week. Members of the crew and cast - including Pamela Rabe (Joan Ferguson) - feature in this inside look at the season's explosive finale, 'Blood and Fire'.Rabe talks filming the episode's fiery climax, and the fall of the Freak, in the 4-minute clip.Wentworth Prison - known simply as Wentworth in its native Australia - has already been renewed for a fourth season.Wentworth Prison: Season Three and Season 1-3 box-set are out on October 12.Pamela Rabe on all new Wentworth Prison: "It's a hothouse for drama"Wentworth Prison: Go inside the compound in behind-the-scenes clip
